mapper.select: select hc.cat_name as hc, mc.cat_name as mc, lc.cat_name as lc, lc.cat_no as lc_no from booking_book_category lc, booking_book_category mc, booking_book_category hc where lc.cat_step = 3 and mc.cat_step = 2 and hc.cat_step = 1 and lc.cat_root = mc.cat_no and mc.cat_root = hc.cat_no order by mc

select hc.cat_name as hc, hc.cat_no as hc_no , mc.cat_name as mc, mc.cat_no as mc_no , lc.cat_name as lc, lc.cat_no as lc_no from booking_book_category lc , booking_book_category mc , booking_book_category hc where lc.cat_step = 3 and mc.cat_step = 2 and hc.cat_step = 1 and lc.cat_root = mc.cat_no and mc.cat_root = hc.cat_no and lc.cat_no = #{cat_no} order by mc

select hc.cat_name as hc, hc.cat_no as hc_no , mc.cat_name as mc, mc.cat_no as mc_no , lc.cat_name as lc, lc.cat_no as lc_no from booking_book_category lc , booking_book_category mc , booking_book_category hc where lc.cat_step = 3 and mc.cat_step = 2 and hc.cat_step = 1 and lc.cat_root = mc.cat_no and mc.cat_root = hc.cat_no and (lc.cat_no = #{cat_no} or mc.cat_no = #{cat_no} or hc.cat_no = #{cat_no}) order by mc
